pages.text: To create higher tier versions of the Woot factory you need to use essence to create the blocks. These essence are generated by the factory when this perk is installed. Each level of this perk defines a number of rolls for the essence generation and a drop chance for each of the essence types. The factory tier determines what the chances are to drop each essence type.
$(li)Tier I - 1 chances to drop essence$(li)Tier II - 2 chances to drop essence$(li)Tier III - 3 chances to drop essence
A Tier I Factory has a 5.0%% chance to drop a shard.$(li)Celadon - weight 80$(li)Cerulean - weight 20$(li)Byzantium - weight 1
A Tier II Factory has a 10.0%% chance to drop a shard.$(li)Celadon - weight 70$(li)Cerulean - weight 25$(li)Byzantium - weight 4
A Tier III Factory has a 20.0%% chance to drop a shard.$(li)Celadon - weight 60$(li)Cerulean - weight 30$(li)Byzantium - weight 8
A Tier IV Factory has a 30.0%% chance to drop a shard.$(li)Celadon - weight 50$(li)Cerulean - weight 40$(li)Byzantium - weight 12
A Tier V Factory has a 40.0%% chance to drop a shard.$(li)Celadon - weight 40$(li)Cerulean - weight 50$(li)Byzantium - weight 16
